name: Bingus and the Curse of the Inadequate Grass (Oregon Trail/ DechartGames Inspired Game)
name_original: Bingus and the Curse of the Inadequate Grass (Oregon Trail/ DechartGames Inspired Game)
description:
Guide Bingus through troublesome terrors of the inadequate grass! 

CONTROLS

Use the up and down keys to move Bingus between the grass.

CREDITS

Special shout out to Bryan, Amelia and the whole DechartGames community for inspiring this idea!
~~~
Game coding and artwork: Emma Baxter ( https://twitter.com/TheDogtor )

Music: Glouglou- Komiku (Free Music Archive)
Sound Effect: MentosLat (Freesound)

https://freesound.org/people/MentosLat/sounds/417486/

Credit to Bladthornprod for the super helpful endless runner tutorial!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBIb_auVtBwBkYGKni2wKHGVFP5b4pVwj
